quest.name: Manual Labor
journal:
 Quest Sync
Duzal Meyean the Steady seeks a dedicated Disciple of the Hand to assist his team of crafts...birds in the creation of durable components.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 15 and above.

Duzal Meyean has asked you to synthesize components for the exhaust outlets to be opened on the Dezul Qualan. Proper equipment to craft these items, however, is only found at the Diamond Forge in Revenant's Toll. Speak with forgewife Fyrbryda about receiving permission to utilize the facilities.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

Fyrbryda's rules for the forge are simple: one, all materials brought inside must be inspected for contraband, and two, if anyone wishes to make use of the facilities, they must first provide a generous contribution to the Revenant's Toll chapter of the Adventurers' Guild. The forgewife believes that fifteen clear water shards and five clear water clusters should suffice. Why the Adventurers' Guild would need something obviously more suited for use in, say, a forge, is probably best left unspoken.

You have collected a sufficient number of shards and clusters. Return them to Fyrbryda immediately before the Adventurers' Guild is forced to shutter its doors due to a crystal shortage. Also, do not forget to submit the exhaust outlet component materials to the forgewife for inspection.

Fyrbryda has granted you access to the Diamond Forge's crafting facilities. Use the materials given to you by Duzal Meyean and inspected by Fyrbryda to synthesize a high-quality exhaust outlet component. Once completed, return to Ehcatl with the item.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Specialization wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Fyrbryda.
You have delivered the exhaust outlet component to Duzal Meyean. The veteran is reassured to find your attention to detail mirrors his own and commends you on your never-ending pursuit of perfection.
objectives: Speak with Fyrbryda in Revenant's Toll.
As a miner, mine clear water shards in the Tangle.
As a miner, mine clear water clusters in the Tangle.
Present the exhaust outlet component materials and the crystals to Fyrbryda.
Synthesize an exhaust outlet component Deliver the exhaust outlet component to Duzal Meyean the Steady.

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Caw! Deft hands, I seek. Feathered, featherless, I care not. My brethren, I trained myself, but all talons, they are. Finesse, they lack. Perfection, out of their grasp, it lies.

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Tasked with crafting of Dezul Qualan's exhaust outlet, we are. If pipes not perfect, trapped inside, smoke shall be. Suffer, crew shall. Die, crew shall! Caw!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Tasked with crafting of Dezul Qualan's exhaust outlet, we are. If rubber joints not perfect, bend, pipes shall. Break, pipes shall. Disaster, there shall be! Caw!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Tasked with crafting of Dezul Qualan's exhaust outlet, we are. If filters not perfect, black, our smoke shall turn. A trail in the sky, we shall leave. Visible to our enemies, we shall become. Caw!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Your face, smooth and ugly, it is. But with ugliness comes privilege. Where refused, an Ixal is, welcome are the daughterssons of man─welcome to use gifts of art and knowledge. To the Diamond Forge, you must go. To Fyrbryda, you must speak. The gifts of art, she tends. Guide you to perfection, she shall!

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: To the Diamond Forge, you must go. To Fyrbryda, you must speak. Guide you to perfection, she shall. Caw caw!

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: Time is short, so I shall avoid mincing words. My rules here are simple. Follow them, and you are free to use the facilities for as long as you need.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: Rule one─aught that passes through those doors must be inspected. I will have no contraband within my walls. Period. Rule two─you make a contribution of my choice to the Revenant's Toll chapter of the Adventurers' Guild. No questions asked. No exceptions.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: If that suits you, journey to the southeastern edge of the Tangle and gather fifteen clear water shards and five clear water clusters.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: What the crystals are for, I am not at liberty to say. Remember, no questions asked.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: Journey to the southeastern edge of the Tangle and gather fifteen clear water shards and five clear water clusters. Do that, and the facilities are yours to use as you see fit.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: Quick now. There isn't much time.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: Yes... Flawless and void of all impurities. These will suffice. As for your materials...though obviously of questionable origin, I have found naught the guild has deemed forbidden. Proceed, then.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: If you require more time or materials, do not hesitate to ask, for today I am in your debt. I did not mention it before, but the crystals you brought earlier, they are to be used by the midwife tending to my sister. She is due at any moment, and without fresh water from a source other than the corrupted Silvertear Lake, there is the risk that the baby may fall ill soon after birth.

dialogue.name: FYRBRYDA
dialogue.text: I suppose this is farewell. If aught should happen to your work while on the road, do not hesitate to return here for additional materials, for this day I am in your debt. You see, I have just received word that my sister has given birth to a healthy baby girl. Yes, I am a new aunt, thanks, in part, to your help.

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Caw! Hurry not, featherless one. For perfection, time, it does take.

dialogue.name: DUZALMEYEAN
dialogue.text: Caw! Without flaw, these are. More than suffice, they shall. Yes, yes. Much alike, we are, for satisfied with imperfection, we are not. Learn much from you, my crafters could, if not buzzard-brained, they were. Caw!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You now have access to the crafting facility.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To complete this quest, you will need to change your class to miner by equipping a pickaxe to your main hand.
